alert.note: Alert for Gregg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 8:00AM CDT until May 08 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following creek in Texas... Rabbit Creek At Kilgore affecting Gregg County. For the Rabbit Creek...including Kilgore...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rabbit Creek At Kilgore, Texas. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10 feet, Expect lowland flooding of timber resources in and near the creek. Some oil field operations may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 10.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum creek stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 AM CDT Friday was 10.3 feet. - Forecast...Rabbit Creek is expected to fall below flood stage this Friday afternoon and continue falling to 3.9 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 10 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 800 AM CDT.
